Precedence and Associativity of Oxide

Operator Prec. & Assoc.
* / Left to right
+ - Left to right
== != < > <= >= Require parentheses when chaining comparison operators
&& Left to right
|| Left to right
.. ..= Require parentheses
= Right to left
( ) Explicitly modify precedence of subexpressions. Inner grouped expressions first. Left to right
